title: Delhi News Live Updates: HC grants bail to Sharjeel Imam in 2020 Delhi riots case
comments: This bail does not mean that he will be set free as he continues to be held under the Unlawful Activities Prevention Act in the Delhi riots ‘larger conspiracy’ case.
